strapiPost.title: New Specialty Food Shop & Cafe Opening In Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Who out there identifies as foodies? Well so do the owners of the new Rogers cafe, Nola’s Pantry, and they’re bringing more specialty culinary delights to Northwest Arkansas. 

  • In-store: Nola’s Pantry is a Specialty Food Shop and Cafe that specialized in small-batch items and goods. The shop has unique bulk spices, hot sauces, jams, teas, gifts, and the like. The cafe offers grab-n-go items including sandwiches, salads, soups, smoothies, skewers, and charcuterie boards. 
  • Soft open: The new spot is located in historic downtown Rogers at the corner of Chestnut and 1st. It will be hosting a soft opening Tuesday, March 8. The retail side will be fully open and ready for business, so stop by, try some free samples, and give some feedback!

For more info, click HERE.
